attributes.action: Stop putting up the price of Diesel and Petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of fuel is astronomical and the alternative of public transport is poor and unreliable.  The thought of £1.50 at the pumps is absurd.  Leave us poor motorists alone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
